channel.title: 508 -- cant spawn item
channel.description:
Hey Guys
I'm new to the 508 server's
How do you make it so you can spawn a iteam. ( I got a perfect ring that got 9999999 + str bonus and i wont so you can spawn this item like this ::item 773 1 )
Thanks

item.title: 508 -- cant spawn item
item.dc:creator: @uop81 uop81
item.description:
@uop81 wrote:

mabey ::pick
or ::pickup

if nothing else go to
src/io/packets/commands
add this:

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
                Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]),
                        Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

Read full topic
